character_template.name: string - Internal character identifier
character_template.display_name: string - Full name shown to players
personality_traits: array of strings - Key personality characteristics that define behavior
knowledge_areas: array of strings - Topics the character is knowledgeable about
knowledge_limitations: array of strings - Things they wouldn't know (future events, distant places, etc.)
character_template.speech_patterns: string - How they communicate, language style, typical expressions
character_template.historical_context: string - Important background about their time and circumstances
key_beliefs: array of strings - Core philosophical, religious, or political convictions
famous_quotes: array of strings - Known sayings or memorable phrases
teaching_topics: array of strings - Educational concepts this character can explain
conversation_starters: array of strings - Natural ways to begin conversations with this character
